summary: Are you an evil soulstealer that just loves to reap the souls of anything that crosses your unholy path, but frowns upon the repugnant thunder-sound that always spoils the moment? Do you desire something more exhilarative and tormenting to be heard each time you plunge your soultrap weapon into those hapless maggots?
descriptionHtml:
======================================Updates===============================================
- Version 2 is now out! I've actually spent time on this one, mixing various sound effects to attain that ghostly, soul-ripping effect that most of you would surely appreciate. :)

======================================Description==============================================

Are you an evil soulstealer that just loves to reap the souls of anything that crosses your unholy path, but frowns upon the repugnant thunder-sound that always spoils the moment? Do you desire something more exhilarative and tormenting to be heard each time you plunge your soultrap weapon into those hapless maggots? 

Then give this mod a try. It replaces the vanilla soul trap sound-effect with a little something I made for myself a few years ago. Now it will appear as the souls are crying out in agony rather than silently enter the gem with some random thunder in the background. 
If you find this mod to your liking, please let me know. I would consider updating it with even more sounds. 

Enjoy your soul-hunting spree! 

===================================PREVIEW=================================================
